EmailTemplate.name: TS-2017-02-14-Microsoft Ignite Australia.EMAIL-Microsoft Ignite Booth Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic at Microsoft Ignite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See Turbonomic at Microsoft Ignite Real Time. Self Managing. Application Performance. Turbonomic is thrilled to be attending Microsoft Ignite Australia 2017. We will be demonstrating our patented Autonomic Platform--revealing how it continuously analyses application demand and automatically allocates shared resources in real-time. Stop by stand 42 to learn more, grab some swag or simply say hello! Turbonomic
500 Boylston St, 8th Floor
Boston, MA
02116
